item.title: Jupyterlab中显示Plotly的图形
item.author: Wuxf
item.description: 需要借助 IPython.dispaly.HTML 对象,在 Jupyterlab 安装的时候就已经可用了,具体用法如下: from IPython.display import HTML import plotly.graph_objects as go # 准备数据 x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] y = [1, 4, 9, 16, 25] # 创建线形图 fig = go.Figure() fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=x, y=y, mode="lines")) fig.update_layout( title="Simple
